page.title: 10HOTELS IN BRENTWOOD
page.content:
The{Post House}and{Moat House}are both in Brook St about 2km from the centre of Brentwood.
The Moat House replaced a private house.It has{40}bedrooms and can accommodate{80}people in varied rooms from single to a honeymoon suite.
The Post House replaced a farm. It has{129}bedrooms and can accommodate over{200}people.
The rooms in both hotels contain a private bathroom,colour TV and electric hairdryer.The average price of a single room with breakfast and evening meal is{Â£46}per night.The guests are mainly business people coming from the North and South of Britain and abroad.They stay for only a few days.
